result.arabic_text: أَوۡ يَأۡخُذَهُمۡ فِي تَقَلُّبِهِمۡ فَمَا هُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ
result.translation: Canke bagashikirwa n’ibihano giturumbuka, bari mu kwishira no kwizana[337]! Nta ho rero bohungira ibihano vy’Imana Allah, canke ngo bayinanire Ishatse kubahana;
result.footnotes: [337] Canke ko Imana Allah Itobahanisha gukehanirwa mu matungo n’umwimbu, no kubura ababo.
